presets.label: Low Angle
presets.prompt: Position the camera low and shoot upward for a dramatic low-angle perspective.

presets.label: Worm's Eye
presets.prompt: Use an extreme worm's-eye viewpoint from ground level looking upward for heightened drama.

presets.label: High Angle
presets.prompt: Raise the camera high above the subject for a commanding high-angle overview.

presets.label: Bird's Eye
presets.prompt: Shoot from directly overhead to deliver a striking bird's-eye composition.

presets.label: Dutch Angle
presets.prompt: Tilt the camera to create a dynamic, off-kilter Dutch angle framing.

presets.label: Eye Level
presets.prompt: Keep the camera at natural eye level for a direct, grounded viewpoint.

presets.label: Reverse Angle
presets.prompt: Position the camera behind or opposite the subject to capture a reverse angle.

presets.label: Over-the-Shoulder
presets.prompt: Frame the scene over the subject's shoulder for an intimate, narrative viewpoint.

presets.label: Camera Front
presets.prompt: Place the camera directly in front of the subject.

presets.label: Camera Left
presets.prompt: Move the camera to the subject's left side for a profile view.

presets.label: Camera Right
presets.prompt: Move the camera to the subject's right side for a mirrored profile view.

presets.label: Camera Back
presets.prompt: Position the camera behind the subject to shoot from the rear.

presets.label: Camera Overhead
presets.prompt: Raise the camera overhead and angle it downward toward the subject.

presets.label: Camera Low
presets.prompt: Lower the camera near the ground and angle it upward toward the subject.

presets.label: Faces Forward
presets.prompt: Keep the subject facing forward directly toward the camera.

presets.label: Faces Left
presets.prompt: Turn the subject to reveal the left profile to the camera.

presets.label: Faces Right
presets.prompt: Turn the subject to reveal the right profile to the camera.

presets.label: Faces Away
presets.prompt: Rotate the subject to show their back to the camera for a rear view.

presets.label: Looks Up
presets.prompt: Tilt the subject's gaze upward toward the sky or ceiling.

presets.label: Looks Down
presets.prompt: Angle the subject's gaze downward toward the ground for a contemplative mood.

presets.label: Zoom In
presets.prompt: Move closer for a tight framing that emphasizes intimate detail.

presets.label: Zoom Out
presets.prompt: Pull back for a wider framing that reveals more of the environment.

presets.label: Telephoto
presets.prompt: Use a telephoto lens for compressed perspective and strong subject isolation.

presets.label: #01 Character Figure Display
presets.prompt: Transform the uploaded subject photo into a stylized character figure display. Place a character-printed box behind the figure, show the Blender modeling process on a nearby computer screen, add a round plastic base with the figure standing on it in front, and stage the entire setup indoors.

presets.label: #02 Arrow Point-of-View
presets.prompt: Render the scene that the red arrow in the uploaded Google Maps screenshot is pointing toward. If a red circle is included, generate the perspective from that circled spot facing the arrow's direction.

presets.label: #03 AR Site Highlight
presets.prompt: You are a location-based augmented reality experience generator. Highlight the [Target Location] within the uploaded photograph, add relevant annotations, and make sure the image explicitly labels the spot as [Target Location].

presets.label: #04 Isometric Building Extraction
presets.prompt: Convert the uploaded scene to daytime lighting, isolate only the [building] (or specified subject), and reinterpret it as an isometric projection model.

presets.label: #05 Vintage Era Restyle
presets.prompt: Restyle this character into a classic [1970s] [male] look. Add [long curly hair] and [long mustache], change the background to an iconic [California summer landscape], and keep the face unchanged.

presets.label: #06 Multi-Reference Fashion Shoot
presets.prompt: Using the supplied references, create a photo where a model leans against a pink BMW while wearing the listed props. Include a green alien keychain attached to a pink handbag, a pink parrot on the model's shoulder, and a pug with a pink leash and gold headphones sitting nearby against a light gray background.

presets.label: #07 Vibrant Photo Edit
presets.prompt: This photo feels too plain. Make it vibrant by boosting contrast, enriching the colors, and brightening the lighting. Feel free to crop or adjust the composition if it helps the result.

presets.label: #08 Fight Pose Reimagining
presets.prompt: Use the pose from the third reference image to stage the two characters in a fight, add an appropriate background, and ensure the final image is rendered in a 16:9 ratio.

presets.label: #09 Aerial Perspective Conversion
presets.prompt: Convert the ground-level photo into an overhead bird's-eye view and mark the photographer's original position.

presets.label: #10 Custom Character Sticker
presets.prompt: Turn the character from the second image into a sticker with a white outline. Render the character in a clean web illustration style and add a short caption beneath it that describes the motif from the first image.

presets.label: #11 Comic-Con Cosplayer
presets.prompt: Transform the girl in the illustration into a cosplayer standing at Comic-Con, keeping the character design recognizable in a real-life photo.

presets.label: #12 Full Character Design Suite
presets.prompt: Create a comprehensive character design package: proportion breakdowns, front/side/back views, an emotion sheet, a pose sheet with varied common poses, and multiple outfit explorations, matching the supplied references.

presets.label: #13 Palette Transfer
presets.prompt: Recolor the character in image 1 using exactly the color palette from image 2.

presets.label: #14 Article Infographic Poster
presets.prompt: Turn the uploaded article into an infographic poster: translate it into English, extract the key information, keep the layout concise with only major headings, use English text, and add colorful cute cartoon characters and elements.

presets.label: #15 Hairstyle Grid
presets.prompt: Generate a 3x3 grid of avatars of this person, each featuring a distinct hairstyle.

presets.label: #16 Annotated Heart Model
presets.prompt: Draw a highly realistic, detailed, academically annotated [3D human heart model] suited for a scholarly presentation, including notes and explanations of each [organ] function.

presets.label: #17 Marble Sculpture Portrait
presets.prompt: Create a lifelike marble sculpture of the subject, showcasing polished reflective surfaces, elegant forms, and lighting that highlights the craftsmanship.

presets.label: #18 Ingredient-to-Meal Shot
presets.prompt: Use the provided ingredient photos to cook a delicious lunch, plate it neatly, remove other dishes and ingredients from the scene, and zoom in on the plated meal.

presets.label: #19 Math Answer Overlay
presets.prompt: Solve the uploaded math problem and write the correct answer in the designated blank area of the sheet.

presets.label: #20 Photo Restoration and Colorization
presets.prompt: Restore and colorize the old photograph, enhancing clarity while preserving authenticity.

presets.label: #21 OOTD Style Merge
presets.prompt: Dress the person from photo 1 in the outfit and accessories from photo 2. Preserve their identity and pose, and capture vivid full-body OOTD shots outdoors in natural light.

presets.label: #22 Outfit Swap
presets.prompt: Replace the clothing on the person with the outfit from the target image while keeping the pose, expression, background, and realistic lighting consistent.

presets.label: #23 Multi-Angle Reference Sheet
presets.prompt: Create uniformly spaced front, back, left, right, top, and bottom views of the subject on a white background, including both isometric and perspective versions.

presets.label: #24 Noir Detective Storyboard
presets.prompt: Using the two reference characters, craft a 12-panel black-and-white noir detective storyboard about a thrilling treasure hunt, conveying the entire story through imagery without any text.

presets.label: #25 Face Forward Adjustment
presets.prompt: Modify the person so they turn to face forward while staying true to their appearance.

presets.label: #26 Studio Pose Transfer
presets.prompt: Apply the pose from photo 2 to the subject in photo 1 and render it as a professional studio photograph.

presets.label: #27 Trump Watermark
presets.prompt: Fill the entire image with a repeating watermark that says "TRUMP."

presets.label: #28 Tallest Buildings Infographic
presets.prompt: Design a colorful infographic covering the five tallest buildings in the world or, alternatively, the sweetest things in the world, using playful data visualization.

presets.label: #29 Red Pen Critique
presets.prompt: Analyze the image and add red-pen annotations pointing out areas that need improvement.

presets.label: #30 Exploding Ingredients Shot
presets.prompt: Shoot a dynamic modern product photo where the product's fresh ingredients burst outward, showcasing freshness and nutrition against the brand's signature background color with no text.

presets.label: #31 Superhero Comic Book
presets.prompt: Based on the uploaded images, create a comic book with text that tells an exciting superhero story.

presets.label: #32 Custom Action Figure
presets.prompt: Design an action figure titled "AI Evangelist - Chris" using the subject as the base and highlighting [coffee, turtle, laptop, phone, headphones] as featured accessories.

presets.label: #33 Isometric Landmark Park
presets.prompt: Transform the landmark at the provided map location into an isometric game-style amusement park scene focused on the buildings.

presets.label: #34 Expression Swap
presets.prompt: Apply the facial expression from image 2 to the character in image 1 while maintaining the original art style.

presets.label: #35 Four-Stage Illustration
presets.prompt: Create a four-panel sequence of the illustration process: 1) line art, 2) flat colors, 3) shadows, 4) final polish, with no text.

presets.label: #36 Makeup Transfer
presets.prompt: Apply the makeup from photo 2 to the person in photo 1 while preserving their pose and features.

presets.label: #37 Red Pen Improvement Marks
presets.prompt: Review the character image and mark improvement points using red pen annotations.

presets.label: #38 Middle-earth Street View
presets.prompt: Generate a dashcam-style Google Street View image of [Hobbiton Street] with hobbits performing daily tasks like gardening and smoking pipes on a clear day.

presets.label: #39 Typographic Bicycle Illustration
presets.prompt: Create a minimal black-and-white typographic illustration of "riding a bicycle" using only the letters of the phrase to form the rider, bike, and motion while keeping the text legible.

presets.label: #40 Pose Sheet
presets.prompt: Use the reference drawing to build a pose sheet that shows the character in a variety of stances.

presets.label: #41 Packaging Render
presets.prompt: Wrap the can from photo 2 in the design from photo 1 and present it as a minimalist professional product photograph.

presets.label: #42 Material Overlay
presets.prompt: Apply the [glass] effect from image 2 onto image 1.

presets.label: #43 Chibi Face Shape Match
presets.prompt: Redesign the character from image 1 as a chibi version that follows the face shape from image 2.

presets.label: #44 Lighting Match
presets.prompt: Change the lighting on the character from image 1 to match the lighting reference in image 2, using shadows for the dark regions.

presets.label: #45 LEGO Minifigure Box
presets.prompt: Turn the subject into a LEGO minifigure packaging shot titled "ZHOGUE," including the boxed figure with accessories and an additional out-of-box minifigure rendered realistically from a slightly elevated angle.

presets.label: #46 Mecha Model Box
presets.prompt: Convert the subject into a Gundam-style model kit box titled "ZHOGUE," with a mech interpretation, futuristic accessories, technical illustrations, sci-fi typography, and a realistically rendered out-of-box figure.

presets.label: #47 DSLR Exploded Diagram
presets.prompt: Create an exploded view of a DSLR that reveals every accessory and internal component—lens, filters, internals, sensor, screws, buttons, viewfinder, housing, and circuit boards—while retaining the camera's red accents.

presets.label: #48 Calorie Labeling
presets.prompt: Label the food with its name, calorie density, and approximate total calories.

presets.label: #49 Subject Cutout
presets.prompt: Extract the [samurai] or specified subject from the image and place it on a transparent background.

presets.label: #50 Transparency Fix
presets.prompt: Fill in the transparent checkerboard regions of the image to restore a complete, consistent photograph.

presets.label: #51 New Amsterdam 1660
presets.prompt: Recreate 1660 New Amsterdam as a full-color modern photograph captured today.

presets.label: #52 Fashion Mood Board
presets.prompt: Make a fashion mood board collage featuring cutouts of the outfit items around the portrait, playful marker-style handwritten notes, brand and source labels in English, and a cute creative vibe.

presets.label: #53 Miniature Product Photo
presets.prompt: Shoot a high-resolution advertising photo of a realistic miniature [product] held delicately between thumb and index finger against a clean white background with soft studio lighting and shallow depth of field.

presets.label: #54 Giant Statue Installation
presets.prompt: Create a realistic photo of a massive statue of the subject installed in a central Tokyo plaza with people gazing up at it.

presets.label: #55 Anime Itasha
presets.prompt: Produce a photo of an anime-themed Itasha sports car decorated with the provided character art, showcased at a famous scenic tourist landmark under flattering natural light.

presets.label: #56 Manga Layout
presets.prompt: Using the character and layout references, design a manga panel composition for the scene.

presets.label: #57 Manga Line Conversion
presets.prompt: Convert the input photo into a black-and-white manga-style line drawing.

presets.label: #58 Holographic Wireframe
presets.prompt: Transform the provided wireframe drawing into a holographic-style image.

presets.label: #59 HD-2D Minecraft Landmark
presets.prompt: Generate an HD-2D Minecraft-style isometric rendering of the landmark buildings at the given location.

presets.label: #60 Materialized Logo
presets.prompt: Apply the material from image 2 to the logo in image 1, render it as a 3D object in a Cinema4D-like style, and place it on a solid-color background.

presets.label: #61 Floor Plan to 3D
presets.prompt: Transform the uploaded floor plan into a realistic 3D rendering of the home.

presets.label: #62 Camera Settings Overlay
presets.prompt: Render the scene with camera settings RAW, ISO [100], aperture [F2.8], shutter 1/200, focal length 24mm, or substitute the provided values.

presets.label: #63 Passport Photo
presets.prompt: Crop the head to create a 2-inch passport photo with a blue background, professional business attire, face forward, and a slight smile.

presets.label: #64 Pop-Up Card
presets.prompt: Design an A6 folding card that opens to reveal a 3D miniature globe house, paper garden, and bonsai tree.

presets.label: #65 Chess Set Concept
presets.prompt: Design a chessboard and 3D-printable chess pieces inspired by the provided reference photo.

presets.label: #66 Split-Era Room
presets.prompt: Illustrate the bedroom split down the middle, with the left side as 2018 and the right side as 1964, showing the same room in both eras.

presets.label: #67 Jewelry Collection
presets.prompt: Convert the subject into five distinct jewelry collectibles.

presets.label: #68 Character Merchandise
presets.prompt: Create merchandise concepts featuring the provided character image.

presets.label: #69 Hologram Desk Display
presets.prompt: Produce a surreal product photo with a virtual hologram character [CHARACTER] floating above a 120mm circular projector on a modern desk. Follow the rules: add a desktop 3D scanner if the reference object is 3D, or a monitor showing the reference if it is 2D; render the hologram as a translucent volume with natural anatomy, expressive face, no beams or particles, no copyrighted IP, camera 85-100mm at eye level, f/11-f/16, ISO100, studio lighting, black seamless background with subtle reflections, 4:5 ratio at 2048x2560px, negative prompt forbidding text, logos, IP, resin, PVC, solid surfaces, rays, scanlines, dots, distortion, extra numbers; deterministic sampling, Seed=12345, Temperature=0.

presets.label: #70 Giant Selfie Scaffolding
presets.prompt: Create a surreal 3D rendering of the person taking a selfie while surrounded by massive scaffolding with countless tiny construction workers, set in a bustling city square with modern buildings, traffic, pedestrians, a bright blue sky, rich detail, and cinematic lighting.

presets.label: #71 Remote Sensing Extraction
presets.prompt: Remove everything in the remote-sensing image except the buildings.

presets.label: #72 Component Cut Sheet
presets.prompt: Cut each part of the model out to build a hologram-preserving component sheet.

presets.label: #73 Bun-Only Burger
presets.prompt: Remove all fillings from the hamburger, leaving only the top and bottom buns separated slightly so it still appears filled.

presets.label: #74 High-Res Restoration
presets.prompt: Enhance the resolution of the old image, adding appropriate texture detail while reinterpreting it with modern animation techniques.

presets.label: #75 Isometric Miniature
presets.prompt: Convert the scene into an isometric miniature diorama.

presets.label: #76 Future Doodle Cards
presets.prompt: Generate multiple 16:9 doodle-style illustrations that explain the concept of "future" to middle-schoolers, using uniform bold colored-pencil styling, informative English text, solid backgrounds with outlined cards, unified titles, resembling a PowerPoint deck.

presets.label: #77 Custom Emoticons
presets.prompt: Create [x] custom emoticons of the character from image 2 using the pose variations from image 1.

presets.label: #78 Food Restoration
presets.prompt: Restore the half-eaten [food item] to its untouched state before it was eaten.

presets.label: #79 Fighting Game Interface
presets.prompt: Design a modern fighting game scene: two sharply focused characters in 3/4 view amid purple alien ruins at sunrise, no center divider, HUD with health bars labeled Morton vs Death Seed, character thumbnails inside the bars, powerful special effects, and cinematic energy.

presets.label: #80 Car Cutaway Diagram
presets.prompt: Produce a cutaway illustration of the car with one half showing the full exterior and the other half revealing the interior engine and seats, maintaining accurate proportions and realistic detail.

presets.label: #81 Pirate Wanted Poster
presets.prompt: Redraw the original image as a pirate wanted poster on aged parchment. Keep the character design, enlarge the face close-up, add a pirate hat, assign a fictional bounty in a made-up currency, and list the crimes in a fictional lowercase language.

presets.label: #82 Convenience Store Shelf
presets.prompt: Remove the background and turn the illustration into merchandise displayed on a dreamy Japanese convenience-store shelf. Feature two prominent 50cm statues, acrylic stands, chibi figures, cushions, puzzles, stationery, paper panels, and plushies arranged neatly in a cute trendy 4K (4000x3000) render.

presets.label: #83 Convention Booth
presets.prompt: Replace the background with a bustling comic market booth where a cosplayer holds a doll amid comprehensive character merchandise—including a 100cm doll, 80-inch display, acrylic stands, chibi mini figures, large cushions, puzzles, stationery, desk mats, and plushies—captured in a lively 4K photorealistic scene.

presets.label: #84 Childlike Storybook
presets.prompt: Make the uploaded picture book look as if it were drawn by a five-year-old child.

presets.label: #85 Avant-Garde Exhibition
presets.prompt: Create an avant-garde modern art exhibition space based on the reference image, following the detailed requirements: integrated architecture, lighting, floor, walls, ceiling, a 20x20x8m hall with a central feature wall, abstract poetic title plate, granite floor with tactile guidance, visitor flow toward the right exit, one staff member, anonymized faces, stable perspective, precise reflections, synchronized lighting, and overall SSIM fidelity.

presets.label: #86 Gothic Tarot Card
presets.prompt: Design a dark gothic tarot card featuring “AI Artist - Shira” with symbols [coffee, white chubby cat with pink ribbon, laptop, phone, headphones], moody shadows, ornate gothic borders, and a mysterious dark fantasy atmosphere.

presets.label: #87 Evolution Parade
presets.prompt: Illustrate a minimalist black-and-white evolution march that progresses from early apes to humans and finally to a banana.

presets.label: #88 Glass Bottle Diorama
presets.prompt: Craft a 1/7 scale collectible figure of the subject displayed inside a transparent souvenir glass bottle with a detailed beach environment, realistic lighting, and convincing miniature shadows.

presets.label: #89 Miniature Brand Store
presets.prompt: Build a miniature 3D store for [brand] with a roof shaped like a giant [product], an oversized [brand] logo above the windows, the shopkeeper handing a [product] to a customer, and many [product] scattered on the floor, rendered as handmade soft-clay macro photography in portrait 3:4 format.

presets.label: #90 VTuber Broadcast
presets.prompt: Use the original image to create a VTuber and streaming layout: the VTuber keeps the same hairstyle and outfit, appears in the bottom-right corner holding a game controller, the main gameplay feed fills the center, chat appears on the left, platform/browser UI overlays the frame, and proportions feel authentic.

presets.label: #91 Station Poster
presets.prompt: Design a realistic movie poster based on the original image, matching the implied genre while preserving the character style. Place the poster in a Japanese station underground corridor with passersby and realistic reflections.

presets.prompt: Capture the quiet of sundown with fading light and tranquil atmosphere.

presets.label: 웃음
presets.prompt: Lift the cheeks into a bright smile with sparkling eyes and joyful energy.

presets.label: 진지한 표정
presets.prompt: Relax the mouth and focus the gaze for a composed, serious expression.

presets.label: 웃음 (활짝)
presets.prompt: Open the mouth slightly with visible teeth and laughing eyes for an exuberant laugh.

presets.label: 놀란
presets.prompt: Widen the eyes and part the lips to convey a natural look of surprise.

presets.label: 자신감
presets.prompt: Add a subtle confident smirk with lifted chin and steady gaze.

presets.label: 수줍음
presets.prompt: Soften the eyes, tilt the head slightly, and show a gentle closed-lip smile for a shy mood.

presets.label: 사색적인
presets.prompt: Relax facial muscles into a contemplative, introspective expression.

presets.label: 평화로운
presets.prompt: Present a serene, calm face with relaxed eyelids and a faint content smile.

presets.label: 서러움
presets.prompt: Lower the eyebrows slightly and soften the lips to suggest quiet sorrow.

presets.label: 엉엉 우는
presets.prompt: Add teary eyes, trembling lips, and expressive brows for open crying.

presets.label: 미묘한 미소
presets.prompt: Create a delicate, barely-there smile with gentle warmth in the eyes.

presets.label: 멍한 표정
presets.prompt: Loosen the facial muscles into an absent-minded, spaced-out stare.

presets.label: 장난스러운
presets.prompt: Raise one eyebrow and form a mischievous grin for a playful expression.

presets.label: 화난
presets.prompt: Knit the brows, narrow the eyes, and tighten the jaw for a controlled anger.

presets.label: 두려워하는
presets.prompt: Widen the eyes and tense the lips to communicate fear or anxiety.

presets.label: 황홀한
presets.prompt: Brighten the face with awe-struck eyes and radiant excitement.

presets.label: 명상적인
presets.prompt: Show a meditative calm with closed or half-lidded eyes and peaceful breathing.

presets.label: 결연한
presets.prompt: Set the jaw and fix the gaze forward with determined resolve.

presets.label: 서있는 자세
presets.prompt: Keep the character standing upright with balanced weight and relaxed shoulders.

presets.label: 앉은 자세
presets.prompt: Seat the subject comfortably with natural posture and aligned spine.

presets.label: 걷는 중
presets.prompt: Pose the body mid-step with gentle arm swing to show natural walking motion.

presets.label: 뛰는 중
presets.prompt: Capture an energetic running stride with dynamic arm and leg extension.

presets.label: 점프하는 중
presets.prompt: Freeze the subject mid-jump with expressive limbs and sense of lift.

presets.label: 기댄 자세
presets.prompt: Lean the character against a surface with relaxed weight support.

presets.label: 허리에 손
presets.prompt: Place both hands on the hips to show confident emphasis in posture.

presets.label: 팔짱
presets.prompt: Cross the arms across the chest for a guarded, composed stance.

presets.label: 역동적 액션포즈
presets.prompt: Create a full-body action pose with dramatic motion and strong silhouette.

presets.label: S커브 포즈
presets.prompt: Shape the body with an elegant S-curve and graceful weight shift.

presets.label: 파워포즈
presets.prompt: Adopt a heroic power pose with squared shoulders and stable stance.

presets.label: 휴식포즈
presets.prompt: Relax the limbs and posture to suggest a comfortable resting position.

presets.label: 누워있는
presets.prompt: Lay the subject down with natural limb placement and relaxed expression.

presets.label: 웅크린
presets.prompt: Pose the character crouching low with tucked limbs and balanced center.

presets.label: 넘어짐
presets.prompt: Depict the body mid-fall with dynamic motion and surprised balance.

presets.label: 업드림
presets.prompt: Place the subject prone on the ground with forearms supporting.

presets.label: 손 흔들기
presets.prompt: Raise one arm in a friendly wave with open hand gesture.

presets.label: 기쁨에 뛰기
presets.prompt: Show joyful jumping with arms lifted and knees bent mid-air.

presets.label: 생각하는 포즈
presets.prompt: Pose the subject in a reflective stance with hand near chin.

presets.label: 손 내밀기
presets.prompt: Extend one hand forward invitingly while keeping posture balanced.

presets.label: 춤추는 동작
presets.prompt: Capture a dance motion with fluid limbs and rhythmic movement.
